Title: Ashyo's Vision
Description:
Have a look at that!

<Ashyo motions at the massive waterfall to the north.>

This must be the water supply for the whole valley!

Think about it, $n: the pandaren use this water to grow vegetables the size of a house. Where could it come from? What is so special about it?

The elders among my people know a technique for speaking with the water and divining the future. Perhaps this same technique can provide insight into the water's source...

It's worth a shot at least!
ObjectivesText: Speak with Ashyo at the Pools of Purity and observe his ritual.
CompletionText: What is that jinyu up to over there?
RewardText: I can't believe he was able to see that with a stick... perhaps there is more to "crazy jinyu rituals" than we thought.
